page.title: 09ROXWELL KENNELS
page.content: If you are ever in Roxwell and you need a place to keep your dog then i would suggest the kennels as an ideal place the dogs have their own kennelsand runs,sizes ranging from 5ft by 3ft for small dogs to 8ft by 8ft for big dogs. All kennels have covered sleeping quarters and some have covered runs as well. In the kennels there are normally about 45 dogs boarding,6 breading and 7 puppies.When the dogs are one month old they have one little meal a day, at 2 months they have 2 little meals a day and so on up to 6 months. A very old dog has 2 separate meals. All dogs need a licence but the vet has to check over the dogs first before you are allowed to pay for it. When the dogs enter all are kept on a list.
